title: 105_s48
content: The "National Endowment for the Arts Termination Act of 1997" repeals sections of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965. The National Endowment for the Arts Termination Act of 1997 repeals sections of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by amending various paragraphs to remove references to "arts and the" and "the arts." The National Endowment for the Arts Termination Act of 1997 amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by redesignating paragraphs and removing references to "arts and the" and "the arts." The National Endowment for the Arts Termination Act of 1997 amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by redesignating subsections and removing references to "the National Council on the Arts," "as the case may be," and "the arts." The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to remove references to "the Arts" and "the Chairperson of the National Endowment for the Arts." The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to remove references to "the Arts" and "the Chairperson of the National Endowment for the Arts." Administrative functions are also revised. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions, including redefining duties and activities of employees at the National Endowment for the Humanities. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities, including changes to subsections (d), (e), and (f). The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities, including changes to subsection (f) regarding financial assistance. The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities, including changes to financial assistance. The amendment involves removing references to "the National Endowment for the Arts or" in subparagraph (C). The National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities, including changes to financial assistance. The amendment involves removing references to "the National Endowment for the Arts or" in subparagraph (C). Authorization of appropriations is granted. Section 11 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to update administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities by removing certain subparagraphs and redesignating clauses. In Section 11 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965, administrative functions at the National Endowment for the Humanities are updated by removing certain subparagraphs and redesignating clauses. This includes striking subparagraphs (A) and (B), subsection (a)(4), subsection (c), subsection (d), and subsection (f). SEC. 5 amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing "the Arts and". SEC. 6 outlines transition provisions for terminating the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Council on the Arts. SEC. 7 specifies effective dates. SEC. 7 specifies the effective dates for the Act, with the general effective date being the date of enactment and specific amendments taking effect at the start of the first fiscal year after enactment.
